Well, I went to Prohibition Wines as the temperature hit 34C and asked for a beer for summer drinking, and this is one that Paul recommended. An interesting and individual Session IPA. Thanks for the recommendation, Paul!

5%ABV. Session IPA.

Poured out a rich Amber. 14¬∫SRM.
